content: a beautiful filet blanket that is quick and easy to make perfect for gifting for any age from new baby to nanna **note this pattern is available for free on my blog select visit pattern website above right on desktop or the url for my blog site below on mobile ** this blanket can be made with yarn of any fibre and ply the mint blanket has been made with dk/8ply acrylic of approx 2000m this is a large size throw rug and has 51 rounds made in total it can be made with less rounds the multi-coloured gradient blanket has been made with 4ply acrylic/cotton blend of 1400m this is a perfect size for a baby blanket there are three files available for download two are written pattern files one has a stitch count after every stitch sequence beginners may prefer this document please decide which instructions you prefer to use before printing there is also a document with simplified charts that is designed to be used in conjunction with the written pattern rather than standalone a free matching beanie pattern is also available this blanket is dedicated to my youngest beautiful boy who radiates joy and compassion to all of those around him he really is a diamond please share your projects with me on ravelry or on social media @thecrochetfix or using #aidansradiatingdiamondsblanket tag
